table.name: civicrm_contribution_page
table.comment: A Contribution object store meta information about a single customized contribution page

field.name: id
field.title: Contribution Page ID
field.comment: Contribution Id

field.name: title
field.title: Contribution Page Title
field.comment: Contribution Page title. For top of page display

field.name: intro_text
field.title: Contribution Page Introduction Text
field.comment: Text and html allowed. Displayed below title.

field.name: contribution_type_id
field.comment: default Contribution type assigned to contributions submitted via this page, e.g. Contribution, Campaign Contribution

field.name: financial_type_id
field.title: Financial Type
field.comment: default financial type assigned to contributions submitted via this page, e.g. Contribution, Campaign Contribution

field.name: payment_processor
field.comment: Payment Processors configured for this contribution Page

field.name: is_credit_card_only
field.title: Is Credit Card Only?
field.comment: if true - processing logic must reject transaction at confirmation stage if pay method != credit card

field.name: is_monetary
field.title: Is Monetary
field.comment: if true - allows real-time monetary transactions otherwise non-monetary transactions

field.name: is_recur
field.title: Is Recurring
field.comment: if true - allows recurring contributions, valid only for PayPal_Standard

field.name: is_confirm_enabled
field.title: Confirmation Page?
field.comment: if false, the confirm page in contribution pages gets skipped

field.name: recur_frequency_unit
field.title: Recurring Frequency
field.comment: Supported recurring frequency units.

field.name: is_recur_interval
field.title: Support Recurring Intervals
field.comment: if true - supports recurring intervals

field.name: is_recur_installments
field.title: Recurring Installments?
field.comment: if true - asks user for recurring installments

field.name: is_pay_later
field.title: Pay Later
field.comment: if true - allows the user to send payment directly to the org later

field.name: pay_later_text
field.title: Pay Later Text
field.comment: The text displayed to the user in the main form

field.name: pay_later_receipt
field.title: Pay Later Receipt
field.comment: The receipt sent to the user instead of the normal receipt text

field.name: is_partial_payment
field.title: Allow Partial Payment
field.comment: is partial payment enabled for this online contribution page

field.name: initial_amount_label
field.comment: Initial amount label for partial payment

field.name: initial_amount_help_text
field.comment: Initial amount help text for partial payment

field.name: min_initial_amount
field.comment: Minimum initial amount for partial payment

field.name: is_allow_other_amount
field.title: Allow Other Amounts
field.comment: if true, page will include an input text field where user can enter their own amount

field.name: default_amount_id
field.title: Default Amount
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: min_amount
field.title: Minimum Amount
field.comment: if other amounts allowed, user can configure minimum allowed.

field.name: max_amount
field.title: Maximum Amount
field.comment: if other amounts allowed, user can configure maximum allowed.

field.name: goal_amount
field.comment: The target goal for this page, allows people to build a goal meter

field.name: thankyou_title
field.title: Thank-you Title
field.comment: Title for Thank-you page (header title tag, and display at the top of the page).

field.name: thankyou_text
field.title: Thank-you Text
field.comment: text and html allowed. displayed above result on success page

field.name: thankyou_footer
field.title: Thank-you Footer
field.comment: Text and html allowed. displayed at the bottom of the success page. Common usage is to include link(s) to other pages such as tell-a-friend, etc.

field.name: is_for_organization
field.title: Allow For Organization
field.comment: if true, signup is done on behalf of an organization

field.name: for_organization
field.title: On Behalf Of Organization
field.comment: This text field is shown when is_for_organization is checked. For example - I am contributing on behalf on an organization.

field.name: is_email_receipt
field.title: Send email Receipt
field.comment: if true, receipt is automatically emailed to contact on success

field.name: receipt_from_name
field.title: Receipt From
field.comment: FROM email name used for receipts generated by contributions to this contribution page.

field.name: receipt_from_email
field.title: Receipt From email
field.comment: FROM email address used for receipts generated by contributions to this contribution page.

field.name: cc_receipt
field.title: Receipt cc
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to cc each time a receipt is sent

field.name: bcc_receipt
field.title: Receipt bcc
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to bcc each time a receipt is sent

field.name: receipt_text
field.title: Receipt Text
field.comment: text to include above standard receipt info on receipt email. emails are text-only, so do not allow html for now

field.name: is_active
field.title: Is Page Active?
field.comment: Is this property active?

field.name: footer_text
field.title: Footer Text
field.comment: Text and html allowed. Displayed at the bottom of the first page of the contribution wizard.

field.name: amount_block_is_active
field.title: Is Amount Block Active?
field.comment: Is this property active?

field.name: start_date
field.title: Contribution Page Start Date
Contribution Page Start Date
field.comment: Date and time that this page starts.

field.name: end_date
field.title: Contribution Page End Date
field.comment: Date and time that this page ends. May be NULL if no defined end date/time

field.name: created_id
field.title: Contribution Page Created By
field.comment: FK to civicrm_contact, who created this contribution page

field.name: created_date
field.title: Contribution Page Created Date
field.comment: Date and time that contribution page was created.

field.name: currency
field.title: Contribution Page Currency
field.comment: 3 character string, value from config setting or input via user.

field.name: campaign_id
field.title: Contribution Page Campaign ID
field.comment: The campaign for which we are collecting contributions with this page.

field.name: is_share
field.title: Is Contribution Page Shared?
field.comment: Can people share the contribution page through social media?

field.name: is_billing_required
field.title: Is billing block required
field.comment: if true - billing block is required for online contribution page
